snippet: Days before he opened fire at Fort Hood, Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, a military psychiatrist, sought advice on how to handle three cases that disturbed him.
abstract: Documents show that Maj Nidal Malik Hasan sent e-mails expressing concerns and seeking advice as a military psychiatrist on how to handle three cases that disturbed him in days leading up to his shooting rampage at Fort Hood; Army never fully investigated Hasan's concerns.
lead_paragraph: Days before he opened fire at Fort Hood, Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, a military psychiatrist, sought advice on how to handle three cases that disturbed him.

headline.main: Fort Hood Gunman Told His Superiors of Concerns
headline.print_headline: Fort Hood Gunman Told His Superiors of Concerns
